title: Classic Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: 1. Boil water and cook spaghetti. 2. In a pan, brown ground beef with onions and garlic. 3. Add tomato sauce and simmer. 4. Serve over cooked spaghetti.
ingredients: Spaghetti, Ground beef, Onion, Garlic, Tomato sauce, Salt, Pepper

title: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
instructions: 1. Cook pasta according to package instructions. 2. Saut√© chicken until cooked. 3. Add cream, parmesan, and cooked pasta. 4. Stir and serve.
ingredients: Pasta, Chicken breast, Cream, Parmesan cheese, Butter, Salt, Pepper

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
instructions: 1. Heat oil in a pan. 2. Add mixed vegetables and stir-fry. 3. Season with soy sauce and serve.
ingredients: Mixed vegetables (bell peppers, broccoli, carrots, mushrooms), Soy sauce, Oil

title: Grilled Salmon with Lemon Butter
instructions: 1. Season salmon fillets. 2. Grill until cooked. 3. Melt butter with lemon juice and pour over grilled salmon.
ingredients: Salmon fillets, Butter, Lemon, Salt, Pepper
comments: The lemon butter adds a nice flavor

title: Homemade Pizza
instructions: 1. Prepare pizza dough. 2. Add sauce, cheese, and desired toppings. 3. Bake in the oven until crust is golden.
ingredients: Pizza dough, Tomato sauce, Mozzarella cheese, Pepperoni, Bell peppers, Onions, Mushrooms

title: Taco Salad
instructions: 1. Cook ground beef with taco seasoning. 2. Assemble lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, beans, and cooked beef. 3. Top with salsa and sour cream.
ingredients: Lettuce, Tomatoes, Cheddar cheese, Black beans, Ground beef, Taco seasoning, Salsa, Sour cream
